mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations ( reservation_group_id, userid, mt20id, seat_section, seat_row, seat_number, price, status, reserved_at ) VALUES ( #{reservationGroupId}, #{userId}, #{mt20id}, #{seatSection}, #{seatRow}, #{seatNumber}, #{price}, #{status}, #{reservedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_id as reservationId, reservation_group_id as reservationGroupId, userid as userId, mt20id, seat_section as seatSection, seat_row as seatRow, seat_number as seatNumber, price, status, reserved_at as reservedAt FROM reservations WHERE reservation_group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT reservation_id as reservationId, reservation_group_id as reservationGroupId, userid as userId, mt20id, seat_section as seatSection, seat_row as seatRow, seat_number as seatNumber, price, status, reserved_at as reservedAt FROM reservations WHERE userid = #{userId}
SELECT seat_section as seatSection, seat_row as seatRow, seat_number as seatNumber FROM reservations WHERE mt20id = #{performanceId} AND status != 'CANCELLED'
